title: Solve the Open Hand Temple Murders
tags: solve the open hand temple murders
content: in the kitchen to reach the underground area of the temple. Press 2 buttons on the wall to open a passage to the cave area. Defeat the doppelganger assassins and cast Speak with Dead spell to learn who sent them. Use the flower key to open the locked room on the 3rd floor of Fraygo's Flophouse. You will find the journal of the murder and another body under the bed. Cast Speak with Dead to learn more about Bhaalist's plan.
